name: Yallaiah Onteru
title: Senior Automation Engineer
professional_summary: Utilized Java and Selenium WebDriver to automate web application testing, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and reducing manual testing efforts by streamlining repetitive tasks.
Implemented Appium for mobile application testing across iOS and Android platforms, enhancing test coverage and identifying critical UI issues early in the development cycle.
Integrated TestNG for test case management, enabling parallel test execution and detailed reporting, which improved test efficiency and reduced execution time.
Applied Cucumber for behavior-driven development (BDD), fostering collaboration between technical and non-technical teams by writing human-readable test scenarios.
Conducted API testing using tools like Postman and RestAssured to validate endpoints, ensuring data integrity and system reliability across microservices.
Developed and maintained automated regression test suites, ensuring consistent application performance and reducing post-release defects by catching issues early.
Collaborated with developers to troubleshoot and debug automation scripts, improving script reliability and reducing false positives in test results.
Implemented continuous integration (CI) pipelines using Jenkins, enabling automated test execution with every code commit and ensuring faster feedback loops.
Managed test data using SQL queries, ensuring accurate and consistent data for test scenarios across different environments.
Performed cross-browser testing using Selenium Grid, ensuring application compatibility across multiple browsers and versions.
Conducted performance testing using JMeter, identifying bottlenecks and optimizing application performance under load.
Mentored junior team members in automation best practices, enhancing team capabilities and ensuring consistent script quality.
Participated in Agile ceremonies, contributing to sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospectives to align testing efforts with project goals.
Documented test cases and automation frameworks, ensuring knowledge sharing and ease of maintenance for future teams.
Worked with version control systems like Git to manage automation scripts, ensuring version history and collaboration among team members.
Implemented logging and reporting mechanisms in automation scripts, providing detailed insights into test execution and failure analysis.
Adapted to changing project requirements by updating and refactoring automation scripts, ensuring they remained relevant and effective throughout the development lifecycle.

Cloud Platforms: AWS (S3, SageMaker, Lambda, EC2, RDS, Redshift, Bedrock)
Azure (ML Studio, Data Factory, Databricks, Cosmos DB)
GCP (Big Query, Vertex AI, Cloud SQL)
